attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
labour costs are so high, why not train up low risk offenders giving them a crash course on the building trades(exclude locksmiths! and build more prisons.
After the prisons are built they can start on the roadbuilding to ease congestion.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not you name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
